title: Top-selling DVDs in the U.S. in 2019
yAxis: Number of units sold in thousands
summary: This is a bar chart representing Movies in the x axis and Number of units sold in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of units sold in thousands is highest at Movies The Goonies and lowest at Movies Aladdin.
The minimum Movies Aladdin has got 1.78 times less Number of units sold in thousands than the maximum Movies The Goonies.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of units sold in thousands for 15 number of Moviess.
The Number of units sold in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Movies The Goonies and lowest at Movies Aladdin.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Movies in the x axis and Number of units sold in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of units sold in thousands is highest at Movies The Goonies and lowest at Movies Aladdin.
The minimum Movies Aladdin has got 1.78 times less Number of units sold in thousands than the maximum Movies The Goonies.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of units sold in thousands for 15 number of Moviess.
The Number of units sold in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Movies The Goonies and lowest at Movies Aladdin.
The second highest Number of units sold in thousands is appeared to be the Movies Aquaman.
The difference of Number of units sold in thousands between the highest and lowest Movies is 396.95.
Number of units sold in thousands at Movies The Goonies is 903.47 , second place is Aquaman at 868.93, and thirdly is Bohemian Rhapsody at 855.06.
Considered together, the average Number of units sold in thousands in all 15 Moviess is roughly 683.27.
Summing up the values of all Moviess, we get total 10249.0.
